SELECT A.lecture_str_date lectureStrDate, A.lecture_end_date lectureEndDate , A.lecture_str_time lectureStrTime, A.lecture_end_time lectureEndTime, B.lecture_name lectureName , C.nm name, C.gender gender, C.birthdate birthDate, C.phone phone , C.address address, C.email email , D.major_name majorName, C.created_at createdAt FROM lecture_applly A INNER JOIN lecture_name B ON A.ilecture_name = B.ilecture_name INNER JOIN professor C ON A.iprofessor = C.iprofessor INNER JOIN major D ON C.imajor = D.imajor WHERE C.iprofessor = #{iprofessor} AND A.isemester = (SELECT isemester from semester order by isemester DESC LIMIT 1)

SELECT A.nm name, A.gender gender, A.birthdate birthDate , A.phone phone, A.address address, A.email email , B.major_name majorName, A.created_at createdAt from professor A INNER JOIN major B ON A.imajor = B.imajor WHERE A.iprofessor = #{iprofessor}
